title: Garage Items Quiz
description: Can you identify common items found in a typical home garage? From storage to maintenance supplies!

questions.question: What garage item is a portable container with a spout, used to store and pour gasoline?
Which device lifts a vehicle off the ground so you can change a tire?
What is a workbench used for in a garage?
options: Providing a sturdy surface for projects, repairs, and tool storage

questions.question: Which item is a long, coiled garden hose stored on a wall-mounted reel?
What is a shop vacuum designed to pick up that a regular vacuum cannot?
options: Liquids, heavy debris, and large particles

questions.question: Which safety item should be mounted on the wall of every garage for fire emergencies?
What is a pegboard used for in a garage?
options: Organizing and hanging tools using hooks and pegs

questions.question: Which product is a lubricant spray in a blue and yellow can, famous for its many household uses?
What are jack stands used for?
options: Supporting a vehicle safely after it has been raised by a jack

questions.question: Which garage storage solution is a set of clear plastic drawers or bins for organizing small parts?
What is a creeper used for in a garage?
options: Lying on and rolling under a vehicle for underneath work

questions.question: Which item is a heavy-duty electrical cord that extends the reach of a power outlet?
What is a battery charger/maintainer used for in a garage?
Which container, usually red, is used to safely collect and dispose of used motor oil?
What are tire pressure gauges used for?
options: Measuring the air pressure inside a tire
